channel.title: CVE Feed for Anadnet -- Quick Page/Post Redirect Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Anadnet -- Quick Page/Post Redirect Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-36699|2024-08-04T17:37:05.275Z -- anadnet -- quick%20page%2Fpost%20redirect%20plugin
item.description: The Quick Page/Post Redirect Plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to authorization bypass due to missing capability checks on the qppr_save_quick_redirect_ajax and qppr_delete_quick_redirect functions in versions up to, and including, 5.1.9. This makes it possible for low-privileged attackers to interact with the plugin settings and to create a redirect link that would forward all traffic to an external malicious website.
